meanings.definition: A person who operates a grain mill.
meanings.sent1: The grainers at the mill work hard to grind the grains into flour.
meanings.sent2: The local grainers ensure that the grain mill runs smoothly every day.
meanings.sent3: The grainers decided to have a race to see who could grind the most grains in an hour.
meanings.sent4: She was a grainer, turning the wheel of the mill with determination like grinding grains of time.
meanings.sent5: The grainers' job is to turn grains into the essential flour that feeds the town.

meanings.definition: A machine used for grinding grain.
meanings.sent1: The old grainers in the barn were still functional after many years of use.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on grainers to process their harvested grains efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The grainers in the field were having a conversation about the best way to grind grains.
meanings.sent4: The grainer hummed as it worked, grinding the grains into fine powder.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise of the grainer filled the air as it processed the grains.

meanings.definition: A person who works with wood grain.
meanings.sent1: The skilled grainers in the workshop carefully shaped the wood to highlight its natural grain.
meanings.sent2: He learned from the experienced grainers how to bring out the beauty of wood grain.
meanings.sent3: The grainers joked that they could read the history of the tree in its grain patterns.
meanings.sent4: She was a master grainer, creating intricate designs that followed the wood's grain.
meanings.sent5: The grainers' hands moved with precision, revealing the hidden beauty of the wood grain.

meanings.definition: A person who adds grain-like texture to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The artistic grainers used special tools to create a realistic grain effect on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She hired professional grainers to give her walls a unique grain texture.
meanings.sent3: The grainers were so skilled that they could make any surface look like natural grain.
meanings.sent4: The grainer's brush strokes mimicked the delicate patterns of wood grain on the door.
meanings.sent5: The grainers transformed the plain wall into a work of art with their textured grain patterns.
